name: tcd-csu1102x-helper
description: Automatically configure your VSCode settings for the module CSU11021/CSU11022 at Trinity College Dublin

tcd-csu1102x-helper.armToolchainPath.title: Arm GNU Toolchain Path
tcd-csu1102x-helper.armToolchainPath.description: Path to the directory/folder containing Arm GNU Toolchain executables (usually sneing in /bin)
tcd-csu1102x-helper.armToolchainPath.default: C:/Program Files (x86)/Arm GNU Toolchain arm-none-eabi/12.2 mpacbti-rel1/bin

tcd-csu1102x-helper.gdbPath.title: GDB Path
tcd-csu1102x-helper.gdbPath.description: Full path to the GDB executable (usually arm-none-eabi-gdb, arm-none-eabi-gdb.exe or gdm-multiarch)
tcd-csu1102x-helper.gdbPath.default: C:/Program Files (x86)/Arm GNU Toolchain arm-none-eabi/12.2 mpacbti-rel1/bin/arm-none-eabi-gdb.exe

tcd-csu1102x-helper.qemuPath.title: QEMU Path
tcd-csu1102x-helper.qemuPath.description: Full path to the QEMU emulator executable (qemu-system-arm.exe or qemu-system-arm)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
